case.state: What're you doing? You've already got maximum bragging rights against me. I don't have anything to give you, so just stop, okay?
You're still playing with me? I don't have anything else for you. You've seen it all.
You know you can stop playing with me now, right? You beat me at my full power. I don't have any secret collectibles or anything.
Nice to see you too, "Helper-chan."
Oops, I caught another case of evilness. Guess you're just gonna have to beat me again -- and I'm still not gonna go easy on you!
I dunno how I un-eviled and I dunno how I re-eviled, but here we are again. Gimme your best shot, see if you can beat me again.
Couldn't get enough of my tits, huh? Too bad, I'm evil again. I'm not gonna make seeing them again easy.
So you beat me and you're choosing to play with me again anyway? I'd be flattered if I weren't so, y'know, hilariously evil.
You know I don't have anything else for you, right? You've seen everything. I don't have collectibles or an epilogue or any of that crap, so don't bother asking.
Am I stuck in a time loop or are you just awful?
Look, I'm happy to keep beating you, but can't you at least, like, change your clothes up or something?
At this rate, I'm starting to think you like losing to me. It's not fun for me if you're enjoying it!
I don't care how many times I beat you, I am not going to be your "dommy mommy."
"Nana korobi ya oki." In other words, "I'm going to keep shoving you down."
Thought you could get rid of me? Nuh uh. I'm nothing if not persistent.
Bet'cha can't get me out of your head, huh? Psychological torment will do that to ya.
Question: will there be any clothe destruction? 'Cause if not, I'm out.
Buckle up, ladies, this is gonna be one wild game!
There wouldn't happen to be any broken nose fetishists here, would there? Aw, who'm I kidding, I'll break someone's nose anyway!
Just say the word and I'll string you up by your feet! People find that sexy, right?
Don't get too excited, I'm here to win. It'd hold no direct value to me, but it's a small victory I just can't let anyone have.
Hope none of you are gonna try to play therapist on me. I'm not troubled, I'm not lonely, and my home life is great. I just like being evil, okay?
'Sup? I'm like a sadist, 'cept it's not sexual -- my fetishes lie elsewhere.
Luckily for you, you got me and not my sister. She doesn't talk much, but I constantly make witty and sarcastic remarks!
If you're into feet, be thankful you got me and not my sister. She doesn't really have feet. Unless you're into cold, mechanical feet?
Anyone who says bad things about my teeth'll get theirs knocked out! I take good care of my teeth, I just happen to have an overbite!
Yeah yeah, I know, I have "resting rat face." Come up with a new one, why don'tcha?
Hey, is this gonna take long? I've got evil things to be doing, and I run a tight schedule.
Doctors say I'm a sociopath. I prefer the term "evil genius."
I'm all Hyde and no Jekyll.
You trying to get a collectible outta me or something? Too bad, I'm not giving you crap.
Can't get enough of me and my incredible grapple arms, huh? Figures.
You following me, ~player~? Fair warning, unlike most people, I'm not afraid to just straight-up kill a stalker. So, y'know, don't stalk me.
You again? Is it love, or Stockholm syndrome?
Okay, now you're starting to get on my nerves. How many times do I have to encounter you before you get that you can't "fix" me?
You're not trying to get my grapple arm blueprints outta me, are you? 'Cause it's not hard to figure out. Every evil genius knows how to make them.
What're you, trying to be my apprentice or something? Well it ain't gonna happen. You can't teach evil.
Seriously, ~player~, stop trying to "fix" me. I'm not broken!
It's official. I'm stuck in a time loop with this ~player.ifMale(guy|chick)~...
Nice to see you too, "Helper-chan."
That's your girlfriend, huh? I think we both know you can do better than that.
Oh well. I must've scared ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ off.
I get it. Not everyone can handle playing a game with a super villain.
Hey! Why'd you deselect ~target.ifMale(him? I wanted to torment him!|her? I wanted to torment her!)~
I don't share my table with quitters anyway.
Is it normal for people to wander in and out like that? I would've thought people would know where they're going.
Make up your mind already, ~player~! I'm not waiting around all day for you!
Ugh, good riddance. I could smell ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ from here.
Don't worry, I'll keep the next one from getting away! I'll just tie 'em up!
That's right! Run while you still can!
Okay, I know I'm not the most conventionally attractive, but c'mon, I'm not that unattractive.
Quick! Start the game before ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ comes back!
Henchmen? Really? And from two different groups? You guys can't even agree on who to be an underling for?
Ha! Scared of me already, that's what I like to see! I'll spare your jaw -- for now.
Ugh, an anthro... Never did care for furries...
Ugh, an anthro. I hate anthros... I mean I hate a lot of things but I always know why. Not so with furries...
Ugh, a furry... Can't you just have, like, a normal face?
Ugh, an anthro... My uncle was killed by an anthro bandicoot...
Ugh, smoking? Really? I may be evil, but I don't kill, and second-hand smoke is basically chemical warfare. That's against the geneva conventions, you know!
Hah. Nice car. Not. That thing was outdated in the 90s, so it's basically a fossil now, and not even a good-looking one!
Hey, nice shoe box. Oh wait, that's your car. If you're gonna drive an old car, you could've at least gotten something nice, like a 1958 Cadillac Eldorado.
Who invited the mime? Oh well, guess I'll just have to do enough talking for the both of us!
Hey! Me! You can't be here! Go back to your own universe!
Oh, an impersonator, huh? How about we go toe-to-toe and see how well you copy me?
Dang, I knew I looked good, but dang, I look good. Weird how much a mirror takes away from how you look.
Hey, you the chick I'm based on? Nina... something-or-other?
Is this the part where I fight copies of myself to overcome... something? I don't exactly got anything to overcome, though. I'm pretty happy with myself.
Is the multiverse collapsing or something? There shouldn't be this many of me in one place.
Aw man, just think of how much tether we have between us right now!
Hey, how's about we see which one of us is from the universe where I'm stronger than all the other versions of me? I bet it's me!
Glad to see my multiverse counterparts are still good lookin'. It's a real win-win for ~player~ over there.
Hmmm... Guess I'm from the universe where I'm not diggin' the duplicates. I'm supposed to be one of a kind!
Someone here smells like the ocean. I hate the smell of the ocean.
Streaming this game without the consent of any of your opponents? That's evil! I love it!
Stripping before we even start? Ha! You fool! You're gonna lose before I even strip down to a casual look!
Nuh uh! You're not getting me with that nonsense! I've met enough evil school girls to know that you're probably hiding a space parasite in your torso or something!
Nuh uh! You're not getting me with that nonsense! The "evil school girl" schtick is more common than you think. You're hair is probably super lethal or something!
Wait, seriously? There's nothing special about you? You don't have a spirit fighter or evil hair or anything like that? At least tell me you're secretly a pop star or something!
Wait, seriously? There's nothing special about you? Are you at least from some kind of super prestigious school where you gotta literally be the best in the world to get in?
Huh. Rainbow hair. I should've though of that... Oh well. Pink rocks too!
You're really think you can hide the smell of a zombie from me? Do you know how many undead peers I have?
Isn't it ironic that I look more undead than you, where I strive for the very same look you're hiding? Ditch the makeup, love who you are, you dumb zombie!
Huh. First time I'm seeing a ghost that isn't haunting a robot or something. They're... cuter than I expected.
A butterfly?... A freakin' butterfly? I like The Fly as much as the next guy, but being turned into an insect isn't a super power! You should be spending your time trying to be human again!
Ducks? Why're you putting ducks in your -- oh, crap, sorry, I was reading too far ahead. Let's start over.
I don't care how many of you nature chicks I meet, you'll never convince me that chlorokinesis is a cool power!
Ah, the illustrious "Princess of Death." Gotta say, I'm quite the fan.
A henchman? Really? What, is your boss not strong enough to do his own dirty work?
Question: will there be any clothe destruction? 'Cause if not, I'm out.
Buckle up, ladies, this is gonna be one wild game!
There wouldn't happen to be any broken nose fetishists here, would there? Aw, who'm I kidding, I'll break someone's nose anyway!
Just say the word and I'll string you up by your feet! People find that sexy, right?
Don't get too excited, I'm here to win. It'd hold no direct value to me, but it's a small victory I just can't let anyone have.
Hope none of you are gonna try to play therapist on me. I'm not troubled, I'm not lonely, and my home life is great. I just like being evil, okay?
'Sup? I'm like a sadist, 'cept it's not sexual -- my fetishes lie elsewhere.
Luckily for you, you got me and not my sister. She doesn't talk much, but I constantly make witty and sarcastic remarks!
If you're into feet, be thankful you got me and not my sister. She doesn't really have feet. Unless you're into cold, mechanical feet?
Anyone who says bad things about my teeth'll get theirs knocked out! I take good care of my teeth, I just happen to have an overbite!
Yeah yeah, I know, I have "resting rat face." Come up with a new one, why don'tcha?
Hey, is this gonna take long? I've got evil things to be doing, and I run a tight schedule.
Doctors say I'm a sociopath. I prefer the term "evil genius."
I'm all Hyde and no Jekyll.
This line activates pity mode. I don't want to be unbeatable, 'cause then it'd be even sweeter when I win ten times in a row!

state.text: This line deactivates pity mode. Enjoy losing again!

case.state: Don't mind me, just spying on how many games you play with me.
Ha! None for me!
Gimme ~cards.text~!
Would you look at that, another good hand. I'm so surprised.
I never get tired of coming out on top!
Think you've finally got me beat this round? I can guarantee you don't!
Huh. A pair's not exactly solid. Not sure how I ended up with that...
Only a pair, eh? Should'a got better than that, but I guess I am still at the mercy of chance...
The heck? A pair? I should be doing better than that.
Aw crap, I miscalculated something somewhere...
Crap, this hand didn't turn out how I meant it to... Don't try and tell me "It's karma!" Karma isn't real! I would know!
That's life right there: No matter how smart you are, no matter how many correct moves you make, you can get screwed over with total junk.
Lemme put on some industrial screamo for ya. It'll make your ears bleed!
Really? You don't know if I've killed before? I've done things worse than murder!
Do you really want me to clap? With these hands? I mean I'm all for making horrible clanging noises, I just want you to know what you're asking for.
Not as cool as mine, I bet!
Oh yeah, real smooth recovery, Helper-kun -- not!
"Portal Master," huh? Can't say I've ever heard of those, but I'm good at learning my enemies on the fly, so it doesn't matter.
I dress like exactly what you'd expect a girl like me to dress like when she sleeps. And that's all I'll say.
Heh. Alright, I'll admit, that one was almost clever.
Oh, you didn't know? We were all kidnapped by some psycho, forced to play strip poker for ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ own sick pleasure. None of us know where we are!
How close-minded of you to assume I even want a "partner." What next, you gonna ask me how many kids I'm gonna have after I get married?
Oh, that's all? Just a mage? Like I'm afraid.
Ha! Denying people what they want for no reason other than "It wasn't making enough money." Capitalism at its finest!
Funny, nosebleeds are also a normal side-effect of me punching you in the nose!
You blow a fuse or something, Icebreath? I'm right here!
Ha! Yep, I know that chick. She's so coarse to every that no one wants to help her out of that shackle! Doesn't bother me, of course, but I enjoy her struggles too much to help!
Real shame about him. That sword of his gives him so much destructive potential. What a waste of an ancient magical artifact!
Nah, she doesn't rob banks anymore. She's Von Grimblade's girlfriend now, he's helping her learn to use her powers for good. Like turning into a shark is good for anything other than eating people!
Sure, why not? The bigger I am, the bigger my potential for destruction becomes!
Yeah, I'm gonna go with "No, accidents don't count." Is that all ya got, Helper-kun?
Hmm... Hacking isn't really mean, more like malicious. If that's all ya got, I guess I'll count it.
Oh, we're actually giving out names here? Alright. I'm Natasha. Surprised ya didn't already know that. I'm a pretty big villain.
You've probably heard my name on the news enough times, but I'm Natasha. And if you haven't seen me on the news before, I'm known for bad things. Lots and lots of bad things.
You've probably already heard of me, but I'm Natasha Cerebellum -- yes, the daughter of Dr. Cerebellum, the guy who made robot arms possible.
You know how some people just want to watch the world burn? That's me. Hi. Natasha Cerebellum.
Oh, we're giving out names? Well then, I'm... Natasha. Yeah, let's go with that...
What if I told you I'm going easy on you right now? You have no way of verifying, so you'd just have to take my word for it!
Hope you're liking my winning streak! Or I guess, "Not-losing streak?" Whatever.
Oh, hey, by the way, I may be evil, but non-con is not my thing. I save the life-ruining stuff for people I truly hate.
These aren't my only pair of arms, by the way. I've also got a stripped-down version of these that I can wear sleeves over, and I've been experimenting with a bigger, badder pair too.
Shame that a grapple feature is, like, the pinnacle of mechanical arm gadgets. Sure, you can stash just about anything in them, but nothing is quite as practical as grapple arms.
I've been trying to figure out how I can give myself bigger mechanical arms. The weight is inclined to pull my arms outta their sockets, but supports would just get in the way...
Sure, putting up a middle finger can be an easy way to upset someone, but that's incredibly trite and not nearly personal enough for my tastes.
Seriously, can you believe some people actually get mad if you don't curse? "Use your adult words," they say. "Expand your vocabulary, you myopic troglodyte," I say.
Frankly, you should be impressed I've been cheating. You have any idea how hard it is counting cards, making sure I don't pull something that shouldn't be possible?
I'd actually love to shutdown the "Red Market" -- y'know, human trafficking, hitmen, that kind of stuff. Not for the sake of doing what's right, but because it'd deny people things they want!

If it bothers you that I don't curse despite being a full grown adult in an adults-only situation, then mission freakin' accomplished! It's just one of many little things I do to get under people's skin!
In case it wasn't already super clear: I'm dangerous, so don't try anything "funny," alright? Or do! Give me a reason to bust your jaw!
In case you're wondering, no, I don't have a single kind bone in my body. Bones aren't kind, stupid. Ha!
Any chance any of you are into BDSM? Beatin' and bruisin's kinda my thing. Well, more of a hobby than a fetish.
Any of you into being tied up? I've got enough tether for everyone!
Anyone mind if I get a fire going? I'm not cold, I just like fire.
I'm gonna kick Grizelda's butt if she's not resting when I get home. Her legs are gonna fall apart without a tune up...
Don't worry, I'm not gonna ditch my arms just to pass another round. What kind of weirdo would do something like that?

Hey, just so you know, I find the term "buck teeth" offensive. "Overbite," "rabbit teeth," and "super muncher" are fine, but "buck" invokes the imagery of a deer's ugly freakin' antlers and I won't stand for it!
One time I pulled that "bucket over the door" prank just for the heck of it. Sometimes you just gotta play the classics.
Contrary to popular belief, I actually love people. I just love toying with them more!
Shame Nero Forte's dead. It was fun watching him fail horrendously at being a hero! Seriously, that guy caused more destruction accidentally than I do when I'm actively trying!
You know what's fun? Talking to people before they've had their morning coffee! Super easy way to annoy people! Joke's on them for becoming reliant on caffeine!
I love how upset people can get when their favorite piece of media doesn't end how they wanted it to! People can be such slaves to their own expectations sometimes! It's hilarious!

Don't forget, at any given moment, you could suddenly drop dead. You could suddenly have an embolism, or spontaneously combust, or some kind of freak accident could come along and take you out in an instant.
In case I haven't said it enough or it wasn't clear: I'm evil. Very evil. Like really super freakin' evil.
By the way, don't think that calling the cops will help you. Obviously if super heroes aren't enough to stop me, regular police won't be either! And even if I go to jail, I'll just break out again!
Here's a villainy pro-tip for ya: An easy way to distract your opponent is to endanger innocent bystanders! Gets 'em every time!
Hey, remember that thing you're trying to forget? An embarrassing moment, maybe? Personal failing? Buy something you feel guilty about, perhaps? Hope I jogged your memory!
Hope you enjoy you're sleep tonight. For all you know, when you go to bed tonight, you'll never wake up.
When I was in college, I used to make popcorn in the dorm microwave all the time. The smell made people so mad! The fact that popcorn is a tasty snack is just a bonus!

Would it make you mad
if
I broke formatting rules for no reason? No? ArE yOu SuRe?? >:)

Hey, real question, why are adults talking like toddlers now? Using words like "nuggies" and "chocky milk?" Is that supposed to counter-balance all the children who curse or are people just actively trying to make me wanna break their "fingies?"
You're now manually blinking. And manually breathing. And you're now aware of your tongue.
Friendly reminder: Corporate greed is rampant, destroying the planet and shortening your lifespan little by little all for a quick buck, and there's nothing you can do to stop it.
Remember, you'll either die a meaningless blip in history, or be remembered long enough for your legacy to be twisted and exaggerated into making you out to be a monster.

"You catch more flies with honey than vinegar." You ever stop to think that it's not because honey is sweeter, but because it's stickier? And either way, you're catching them, not coercing them -- it's bad for them either way.

Look, I know you don't wanna accept it, but the fact is, the Gene Wilder Willy Wonka movie was a horribly inaccurate adaptation that only existed to sell you candy. The Johnny Depp one is superior in every way.

You ever think about how even those you trust probably lie to you? Telling you "I'm fine" when they're suffering emotionally. Telling you your art's good when it's not. Telling you they care about you, but not more than the average passerby.
If any of you own pets, I just want you to know how sad and pathetic it is to call yourself its "parent." No, you are not its parent, you did not birth it.

Hope you're having an easy time keep up with what everyone's been saying, ~player~. I mean, some people can sure talk a lot, it can be tough keeping up with what the topic is and if the train of thought you had before you got interrupted is even still relevant, or if you can even remember what that thing was in the first place. Yeah, I know I'm not the first character to do this gag, and I'm sure I won't be the last, but I'm trying to prove my point while simultaneously trolling you with dialogue that you might not even bother to read in the dialogue log. Also, at least for me, the game doesn't continue until I finish what I had to say, so I'm holding up the game for everyone else too. And if you actually bothered to read all of this in the dialogue log, the joke is still on you for being that much of a bozo for dialogue that you'd make sure you've read everything, even long-winded trolls like this. Bozo.
I hate when people try to recommend something by saying "Do yourself a favor" or "You owe it to yourself." How about you do yourself a favor and avoid making me wanna give you a black eye!
So, what's the meanest thing you've ever done? Personally, I've done so many mean things that I can't pick just one "meanest."

I hate a lot of things, but you know what I really, truly hate? Conformity. People mindlessly doing what everyone else is doing. Don't you just hate that? If I catch any of you doing that, I will smash your toes!
Yes, the arms're metal, and yes, they're cold. Wanna feel?
Yes, the arms're metal, and yes, they have weapons stashed in 'em. Wanna see?
Get a good look at my mechanical arms yet? These bad girls are packed with a flamethrower, a bomb launcher, and my special "chaos cannon!"
Get a good look at my mechanical arms yet? I can detach 'em at each joint for grappling, and I can electrify every inch of the tether!
Y'know, despite being so incredibly evil, I'm actually pretty chill most of the time. Go ahead, try and make me angry! I bet'cha can't!
I love when people try to talk in secret around me by using another language. The look on their faces when I chime in regardless because I speak that language too never gets old!
Tired of my winning streak? Think I'm cheating? You're free to frisk me for cards. You won't feel a thing!
By the way, a hotdog is not a sandwich. Nor are tacos, lunch wraps, or hamburgers. Whatever argument you have against this is incorrect.
Honestly, if Superman were real, I bet I could take him. Kryptonite doesn't exactly seem rare, and all else fails, I can prey on his desire to protect people.
Can you hurry up and lose the game already? I've got people to keep miserable.
Listen, there are people out there I need to ensure are miserable at all times, so can you hurry up and lose?
Can we wrap this game up already? I've got sick and twisted things to do to people who may or may not deserve it.
Look, I'm a busy villain, so can we get this game finished already? The sooner we're done, the sooner I can get back to causing public mayhem.
This gonna take much longer? I've got billionaires to torture -- not for money, just for my own amusement.
This line brings my AI down a bit so I'm easier to beat. Don't want you whinin' about me being unbeatable in bug reports.
This line resets my AI, provided I'm not winning. Theoretically, this should make beating me feasible without compromising the believability of my cheating.
Hey! Stop poking around in my dialogue!
This line resets my AI, ideally preventing me from losing nine times out of ten. Pity mode exists for a reason.
I think you're playing a game you can't win, Rei -- oh I'm sorry, I meant "Meia."
Is that the best you can come up with? A threat of unlicensed dentistry? You realize I could do the same to you from across the room, right?
Is that really any different from announcing "I'm the prettiest, most desirable girl here" when you show up?
Yes, I'm human -- and before you ask, yes, it's all natural, and so is my hair.
Nope! Where's the fun in having someone else do your evil for you?
Are you sure you didn't just go to high school with me?
Crap. The odds of me being the first to lose are, suffice to say, not good. This shouldn't be possible...
You actually got me once. Dang. You're already surpassing expectations -- which, granted, is easy to do when expectations are extremely low.
Huh. I actually lost once. I didn't miscalculate, did I...?
Huh. Didn't expect to lose, but naturally I have a contingency plan: Take my clothes off. Duh.
Inga ouhou, I suppose. No, I don't care if you don't know what I just said.
Huh. You got me again. That's almost impressive. No, really. You're playing against an evil genius here!
You're not cheating, are you? 'Cause that would be evil, and then I'd have to give you kudos!
How much would you hate me if I pulled out one of my teeth to pass this round? I'm not gonna do it, I just wanna know how mad you'd be!
You're lucky I value my arms. Do you realize how many nuts, bolts, and wires I could be pulling out of them to stall with?
Y'know, I'm not used to losing. It's a nice change of pace!
Did you really beat me this round or did I just let you win? I'll never tell.

This would be the part where I'd blurt out an advertisement just to screw with you, but like heck am I gonna actually waste breath talking about a real product from a company that'd actually think ads in strip poker are a good idea.
Well crap, I really didn't think I'd lose this much...
Really didn't think I'd lose this much. My only contingency plan is "Keep taking off my clothes..." Eh, I'm not worried.
I'm actually being pushed to the edge of defeat. That's never happened before... What an interesting feeling.
What, you think I'm afraid to show my tits? Yeah right! My tits are fantastic!
Seriously? What, did I not cheat hard enough?
Crap. Should've known probability could screw me over in this...
You want a naked super villain? Fine, I'll give you one!
Hey, you're actually getting me out of my underwear now. Yes, stockings are underwear. I will fight you on that!
So I'm running out of clothes. Do I look like I care?
La yulda il-momen min gohr marratein... No, I don't care if you know enough Arabic to know what I just said.
Are you sure? Memory can be a fickle thing. Maybe you just forgot these things?
Nope! I'm perfectly healthy -- could probably live 'til I'm 100, even! My skin and hair have always been like this!
My arms, for one thing -- well, technically two things. You won't find prosthetics likes these on store shelves, especially because they contain my special "chaos cannon."

state.text: Hey, ~player~, remember when I said I was cheating? I lied. Luck's just been terrible to you.
Wanna know something funny, ~player~? I haven't actually been cheating, you just suck at poker.
Remember when I said I was cheating, ~player~? I lied. I only said that to mess with your head, but really, you've just been unlucky.
Ready to see them again, ~player~? Maybe you're the cheater this time. Can't be luck that's gotten you here again.
Guess this'll be nothing new for you, ~player~. I don't believe luck has gotten you here again. I think you're cheating.

case.state: You may think what I do is selfish, but aren't we all? Sure, you may do good things, but is it not so you feel good, or avoid feeling bad?
You may think villains like me are selfish, but everyone is selfish. At the end of the day, we're all just doing what feels good to us. Good and bad are just perspectives.
You're gonna have to try a lot harder than that to see my underwear. As you can guess, I don't like making things easy!

Hey, instead of trying to peek up my skirt, why don'tcha take a good look at my face. Notice how it's free of scars? That's 'cause scars are for people who get in over their heads, which never happens to me.
So, be honest, what kind of evil things do you think I get up to? Stealing purses? Robbing banks? Maybe killing, just for the fun of it?
Be honest, when I say I'm evil, what do you think that means? Am I just some thief? A vandal, maybe? Or perhaps a cold-blooded killer?
Those "Order of Heroes" bozos make me laugh -- I mean, all authority figures make me laugh, but those guys in particular. They think killing villains is the key to stopping crime. Ha!
Y'know, it makes me laugh when people call money "the root of all evil." Pah! "All evil," they say.
Now's the part where you see I actually have really frilly, delicate panties on that makes you see my character differently, huh? Yeah right!
What kind of panties do you think I have on? Skull-patterned? Black and white stripes? Maybe something pink and frilly?
Growing up, I had this "bully." Wouldn't stop making fun of my teeth and skin. You wanna know what I did?
Believe it or not, I have been bullied before, when I was young. Kept making fun of my skin and teeth. You know what happened to her?
I've been to prison before, you know. Broke out, of course. Like I was gonna live out that sentence.
Isn't it interesting how much easier it is to ruin someone's day -- or year or life -- than it is to "make" it?
Do you think you're unique, ~player~? No, really, do you think your life is really yours?
So what do you think took my arms? Car crash? Lab accident? Or maybe some crazy bet I lost?
Any guesses as to what took my arms? Freak accident? Mishandling a lawnmower? Maybe some rogue neighborhood dog?

I bet you think some super hero made me lose my arms, huh? Ripped 'em off with super strength, or perhaps they got overzealous with their magic, or maybe even tricked me into hurting myself with my own invention?
Too bad for you, I've got a bra on! Gotta keep the girls in place when I'm out swinging around kicking people in the face!
Keep it in your pants, I've got a bra on under this. Why wouldn't I have a bra on under this?
This is my favorite shirt, but I'm willing to sacrifice my material possessions for the greater bad. Also I have a bra on, so I'm still denying you what you want.
I know you're not going to accept it, but the truth is, the world runs on hatred. Think about it.
You probably like to think the world runs on love and kindness, or maybe some kind of desire to "always do better." Wrong. It runs on hate.
You might think the world would be better off without hatred, but you couldn't be farther from the truth.
Don't you just love how often it comes out that someone involved with a piece of media you enjoy is actually a horrible monster?
Confession time: I've been cheating this whole game. I've got cards hidden in my arms. The fact that you got this far is almost impressive, so I won't deny you what you came for.

Alright, honesty time: I've been cheating this whole game. There's cards in my arms. But I'm nothing if not a woman of principle, so I'll see this match through to it's end. I came here to win, and that's what I'm gonna do!
Allow me to soil this lovely moment with a confession: I've been cheating at this game. I stashed some cards in my arms. But I'm not about to run away. You'll get your nudity.
How about I give you some boobs and some truth: I've had cards stashed in my arms this whole time, been using them to cheat. I'll still give you the nudity you so desperately need, though.

To think, I've been cheating this whole time, and you're still gonna see my boobs. That's right, I'm cheating. Obviously luck has gotten the better of me, but I'm not mad. I'll give you what you're owed.
Whatever. I'm far too persistent to back out now!
Yes, I am petty enough to want to win here. Winning is something that's nice, and I can't let anyone have anything nice!
Before you ask, no, I won't give you a view from behind. You should know better than to ask me for anything nice.
You're lucky I don't stink. As easy as it'd be to torment people by having poor hygiene, I much prefer when people realize that the chick who just thrashed them smells better than they do!
I'm really not much of a leg-centric girl. I mean, clearly I let my arms do most of my work. I can kick ya so hard it'll knock the wind out of ya, though!
Make no mistake, disabling my arms won't make me helpless. I can still kick you hard enough to knock ya out.
Don't make the mistake of thinking I'd be helpless without my arms. I'm prepared for every contingency, including those in which I must rely on my legs.
Tell me, ~player~, are you one of those law-abiding anti-police civilians? "Screw the police!" "The only good cop is a dead cop!" One'a those people?
Do you normally play this game with four opponents, ~player~? You ever think about how easy it is for four people to overpower one person and do terrible things to them?
Ugh, you're no fun.
It starts a sub-atomic domino effect that causes a forceful explosion wherever I aim it, with unpredictable lightning offshoots as a natural byproduct!
And what are you gonna do about it, Helper-kun? Call Diego over?
"You don't have a reason to do that," you may think. Oh but you forget, we're humans. We'll find some reason to justify it. It's what we do.

state.text: Why not ask ~player~? ~player.ifMale(He|She)~ looks like a good guesser!
Weren't you paying attention? I already told you! Not my fault you can't remember! ~player~, why don't you remind them?
~player~ is the know-it-all here. Why don't you ask ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ what happened to my arms?
Oh, I'm sorry, I forgot to ask the puppet master if I have permission to exposit. May I share that story, ~player.ifMale(master|mistress)~ ~player~?

case.state: In actuality, it was just a simple lab accident... Oh, I'm sorry, ~player~, is that not what I told you before? Guess it's been retconned.
I lied to you before, ~player~. Actually, I lost a wrestling match to a psychotic robot who kept my arms as trophies. I totally thrashed him in the rematch, though!
I lied before, ~player~. The sad truth is, my father used me as a guinea pig for his cybernetics experiments. Jokes on him, though, I used them to kill him!

I didn't wanna tell ya this before, ~player~, but actually, I lost my arms in the same car crash that killed my parents. Don't worry, though, I found the other driver eventually! Needless to say, he's dead too now!
Wrong! I'm the kind of psycho who'll make you wish you were dead! I'll turn your life into a waking nightmare just for kicks!
Wrong! I'm the kind of psycho who'd kill everyone you love first, and make sure you live a long, miserable life after!
Nah, that stuff is child's play. I'm more into making everything and everyone you hold dear crumble before you while you watch helplessly.

Nah, killing is for losers with inferiority complexes. Dying doesn't give your enemy enough time to suffer. What ya gotta do is make sure they're completely incapable of feeling an ounce of joy ever again.
Well, let's just say that I'm less like a bullet to the head and more like a slow, terminal disease with no known cure.
Sure, I may stab you, shock you, or burn you. I may even tear you limb from limb. But with me, you're not allowed to die!
Maybe, just maybe, I enjoy denying people what they want so much that I even deny other villains what they want too, circling back around to being heroic.
I'm the best kind of evil: Not someone who does bad things for monetary gain, political influence, or social status, but just for the fun of it. In a way, I'm like an artist.
I burned her house down -- twice. She didn't think I'd find her new house, but I did.
I broke her spine. Even with modern advancements, she'll never feel anything below her neck ever again.
Let's just say, she had a dog -- had a dog.
You hate to be hungry, so you eat. You hate to be tired, so you sleep. You hate injustice, so you fight it. Hate is good.
Hate drives us to change things. If you hate something, you strive to erase it, or correct it, or be better than it. Without hate, we become complacent and apathetic.
A lack of hatred wouldn't mean contentment, it would mean complacency. You can't tell me it'd be better to be apathetic to social injustices than it is to hate them.
Part of their logic is that the death sentence serves to scare people out of being a villain. I'm living proof they're wrong!
Haven't they heard "Locks only keep honest people out?" Figuratively, of course. In this case, the death sentence is the lock.
You'd think they'd realize they're just creating a cycle of vengeance and despair. I'm supposed to be the one doing that!
You'd think after they had one ex-hero commit a big massacre in their own base over the issue that they'd start to reconsider.
It's like they never read "What's So Funny About Truth, Justice and the American Way?"
Did you know that 3% of people on death row are actually innocent? Imagine how much bigger that number gets when you apply the penalty more freely.
I'd give myself mechanical legs to match my arms, but I'm wary of that whole "Turning myself into nothing but a brain in a robot body" slippery slope.
I'm pretty mobile with my grapple arms, but I have considered making jet boots to get a better speed advantage.
You should see the mechanical legs I built for my sister. Her knees are scrap cannons!
And no, that's not an invitation to say "Step on me, mommy." I'm not gonna step on you if you'll enjoy it!
They have these power-suppressing collars, you know. Didn't work on me, though. My intelligence isn't the result of a power.
They couldn't diagnose me with anything, so they couldn't medicate me, which only left me mentally clear to jury-rig a new set of grapple arms to break out with!
Prison made the mistake of treating me like a person -- you can thank Golden Glory's push for prison reform for that.
I'm one of those villains that's always thinking several steps ahead of you. The only things that'll happen here are things I allow to happen.
I'm one of those villains that's always thinking several steps ahead of you. Don't believe me? Why don'tcha take a swing at me and see what happens? Go on, make it a good one!

At any given moment, I have at least three contingency plans ready, including... Yep, that exact situation you're thinking of right now, ~player~. You don't even have to say it -- you're not as clever as you think you are.
I get it. There're no other breasts quite like these. Small, perky, blue. You just had to see them again.
You turned on cheat mode so you could see nudity faster. Maybe you're not even paying attention to what I'm saying. I get it.
How many times is enough for you? Twice? Three times? 'Til they don't turn you on anymore? And then what, you just move on to someone else, rinse and repeat?
Maybe you don't care about them at all? Maybe you're just trying to see all of my dialogue? Or find a secret collectible, maybe? Well tough luck, I don't have any.
You think I don't notice what you do here? And I don't mean the ~player.ifMale(jerking|jilling)~ off, I mean all the other stuff. You really think you're doing the right thing?
Well, you're seeing my breasts again, so at least you have a little luck... for now.
Well, you got this far again. Maybe you're the cheater?
Or maybe I'm lying about lying and I am cheating? You'll never know!
Don't you just hate that luck's been on my side this whole time?
You know what else? My name's not even "Natasha!" You're so freakin' gullible! Like I'd just give you my real name!
You really believed that, just like you really believed me when I said my name's "Natasha Cerebellum" -- that my brain surgeon father would really have a name that apt. You're so gullible!
If doing good things makes you feel good, isn't that a form of selfishness? Would you stop doing good things if doing them started to feel bad?
If I do bad things for good reasons, are they still bad things? If I enjoy doing bad things for good reasons, am I still bad? Where do you draw the line?
What about people who do good things for bad reasons? Is their good still valid? What about someone who does good things and bad things? Is theirgood invalidated?
Do you really do good things without expecting a reward, or do you just say that so you can be seen as a "good person?"
Is your view of the world really so black and white? That what I do can only be motivated by selfish desire? That there can't possibly be any good in me?

When you have laws against things like giving food to the homeless and sleeping in your car to avoid driving drunk, you can't tell me the law is "good" -- you can't convince me you don't break laws you find dumb.

Sure, the fourth wall may protect you from us, but remember this the next time you're outnumbered. Remember how easily the people around you could turn on you and pretend it's "the right thing to do."
Clearly, people who say that have never heard of the sick and twisted things I do free of charge!
It's like they've never read a history book. Most of the deadliest wars in history had nothing to do with money.
Do you even know how many murderers killed not for money, but to see if they could get away with it? Or for the rush they'd get? Or out of good ol' fashioned hate?
Try telling that to a homeless person and see how true it feels, after you go home to your dry bed and fridge full of food.
A majority of people who express anti-capitalistic sentiments wouldn't last a week without their purchased creature comforts, let alone growing their own food and sewing their own clothes.
Sure, sure, people who torture animals are just trying to get money out of said animals. That totally makes sense.
I get it's not meant to be literal, but it's still a pretty small-minded view.
I mean, don't get me wrong, corporations are terrible, but there's other kinds of evil out there who aren't after your wallet. Case in point: Me!
It's a valid sentiment. I mean, I could snap your neck right now and the only thing a cop could do would be to make me apologize to your corpse.
If that's how you feel, I wonder if I held a gun to your head, would you still be so dismissive of them?
So, what, do people who think like that just expect the law to uphold itself or something? Or are they just gonna take every bad thing that happens to them on the chin?
All cops are corrupt, absolutely. Just like all homosexuals are ungodly deviants, and everyone who isn't where I'm from is a dirty savage. You hear how that sounds?
I hope you realize generalizations like that are the source of racial and sexual persecution, and the exact mindset that lead to World War II.
Fighting discrimination with discrimination. It's so hypocritical it makes me laugh!
All cops are corrupt, just like all homosexuals are godless sinners, and everyone who isn't my race is inferior, and everyone who is wrong can never change their mind and must DIE!
I wonder how many people who say that only say it to be on the "right" side -- to be seen as "good," or just to fit in.
"Making" someone's year would require something incredibly significant, but all it'd take is one accident to ruin someone's whole life.
Imagine. You're having the time of your life, enjoying some theme park, and them bam! Rollar coast accident leaves you paralysed from the waist down!
All it takes is being in the wrong place at the wrong time, and your whole life could be ruined.
Doesn't even have to be from something you did, your life could be ruined by someone else's poor decision-making or carelessness or incompetense.
Doesn't even have to happen to you directly. It could happen to a loved one, and impact you by proxy. That's what you get for caring about someone.
All it takes is one touch of bad luck, one accident, one intrusive thought, and everything starts spiraling out of control.
How much of what you do is determined by what it would make people think of you? If you could get away with it, how much of a douche would you be?
Do you use slang because you like it, or because it's what everyone else is saying? Are you that desperate to fit in?
Do you waste the gift of free will chasing trends and mindlessly listening to what others "recommend" you watch or listen to? Do you ever notice people subtly turning you into themselves?
Think about it. From the clothes you wear to the words you use, how much of it is for you and how much of it is so you can be liked?
Do you even recognize how much of yourself you surpress for the sake of "acceptance?"
"I'm an individual," you say, while believing everything you hear and parroting the same jokes everyone else is saying.
It's almost like the brains that reach beyond our creative boundaries are also wired to break our moral boundaries too.
It's almost like humans are comletely fallible beings prone to acting on dark compulsions.
Best part is, whether you live in blissful ignorance of things or it all comes to light, the offender always escapes real consequences! It's a real lose-lose situation!
Memes aren't safe, either! In fact, your favorite memes are extremely likely to have been created by someone who has or will do something terrible!
If you expected something nicer-looking, then you haven't been paying attention to just who the heck I am!
Oh, I'm sorry, did you expect something with butterflies or strawberries or something else cute on it, symbolizing a soft interior under the rough facade? It's just underwear, dolts!
Play nice and maybe I'll let a strap slide down -- no, really, I'll do it. Trust me.
Be thankful you got both boots and not just one. I guess I'm just in a generous mood!
Congratulations, you got my boots off. Your poker skill is equal to that of me simply coming home.
Oh, sorry, were you hoping I'd say something more interesting while I took off my boots? Guess I just didn't feel like it. Better luck next time.
Nope! I cut them off myself! Well, my sister did it for me, 'cause y'know, arms, but it was my idea! I couldn't resist giving myself mechanical arms filled with evil technology!
Nope! I asked for them to be cut off! Metal arms make me so much more evil!
Well, maybe I'll just keep you guessing! I don't owe you my backstory!
Maybe I'll just make you keep guessing until you get it right. There's only, like, a thousand ways to remove someone's arms!
Listen here: Being evil? My choice. These arms? My choice. Not getting my overbite corrected? My choice. Nothing about me is an accident, got it?
Sometimes the truth is greater than fiction. Sometimes life disappoints. One of those applies to the story about my arms, but I won't tell you which!
What am I, some kind of cheesy movie villain who exposits her backstory to every opponent she faces? Get real!
It was no accident! It was a decision! A step towards becoming a better villain! Who knows what body part I might lob off next!
Why focus on the past when I can tell you your future. Spoilers, it involves me kicking your butts.
Nah, I cut 'em off, plain and simple.
Oh, I'm sorry, am I expositing too much for you, ~player~? Guess I'll just leave it there.
I cut them off to become a better villain! Let that be a lesson: I will stop at nothing to get what I want!
I can't exactly do my villain business in lingerie -- and yes, I do have villain business to attend to when we're done.

Oh? Did you expect me to take off my stockings first? Nuh uh! Outter layers first, then underwear! Stockings are worn under shoes, so that makes them underwear! I am very particular about this distinction!
That's right, I don't wear shorts under my skirt. Like I care if anyone sees up my skirt, it just means I get to punch 'em for being a perv!
So there. And I'm not gonna stop cheating, ether! You're gonna have to earn my crotch!

Leaving in the middle of a strip poker match would hardly be a fun way to screw with you, anyway. Like, "oh no, you didn't get to see my genitals, just like you do with a majority of the people you meet in life. How clever."
Count yourself lucky I put my evil tech in my arms and not my boobs!
You can touch them, if you want -- as long as you can trust that this isn't just a trick to bring your arms into wrist-breaking range.
Oh, I'm sorry, were you expected pierced nipples? Way to undermine the self-expressionism of punk culture by expecting every punk to follow the exact same trends, moron.
Oh, were you expected pierced nipples? Sorry I'm not a porn stereotype, ignoramus.
You think even for a second that I'm ashamed to be nude? Like, seriously? Really? Me? Yeah right!
The sight of nudity obviously makes most people happy, but it makes some people uncomfortable too, so naturally I gotta have that ready as a tool in my arsenal.
If you didn't believe that my hair was naturally pink before, I've just proven my case beyond reasonable doubt.
With a body like this, how can anyone call me a "freak?"
I know, I know. "Kol mamnou' marghoub." Too bad for you, that proverb is true!
I'm sure you were hoping this'd be the part where I start freaking out 'cause I'm out of clothes and I might totally embarrass myself, but too bad, I have too much confidence for that.
If you're a foot-fetishist, I'll gladly give you a close look at my feet in the form of a swift kick to the face!
If you think a footjob from me would be better than a handjob, you're overestimating how gentle I'd be with my feet!
May I remind you to never stick your dick in crazy -- and no, you can't fix me.
Hey, pal, you know the whole catsuit thing is only cute when girls do it, right? On you, it just looks like you lost a bet.
Hey, bub, didn'tcha get the memo? You're supposed to dress as something frightening. No goon worth anything is gonna be intimidated by Cat Man.
... Oh, I get it, you're a cat so you disarm people with cuteness, right? Too bad for you, I'm a dog person!
Pffft! If your goal with the cat costume was to get your opponents to laugh themselves to death, it's working!
Listen, bud, there was only one male-identifying individual who could make a cat-themed hero work, and he's dead. So what's that mean for you?
Well, if I'm gonna be stuck in a match with a freakin' mascot, at least it's the one known for breaking through walls...
Well, at least you're not one of those furry mascots...
I wanna make a joke like "If I get thirsty during the match, I can at least knock you over and take a drink," but actually, I hate sugary drinks.

I wanna make a joke like "If I get thirsty during the match, I can at least knock you over and take a drink," but actually, I hate sugary drinks, so that joke is inaccurate. Also, if I actually do get thirsty, I'm screwed.
This guy's like the total opposite of me: Tall, buff, bald guy obsessed with cleaning... Obviously, I hate him.
You like to keep things clean, huh? I bet I could make a mess so big even you can't clean it all up!
I don't care how strong or fast or whatever this guy is, he won't last a minute against me!
Blanco, huh? Is that supposed to be your power level or something? Just wait until I show you the power of pink!
Tonto ebrio, puede que haya sido poderoso una vez, pero carece de poder de permanencia! Oh? Didn't think I could speak Spanish? Te lo dije, soy una persona de pueblo!
This character greatly offends me! Pasta is garbage!
Ugh, really? This guy had to be here? I cannot possibly understate just how much I hate pasta, and anyone who cooks it!
Aw man, I love Punch-Out! Hey, Joe, wanna go toe-to-toe?
Aw man, I love Punch-Out! You have no idea how many times I've knocked out the virtual you, Joe!
So... am I supposed to be afraid of this plush or something? 'Cause I can't be afraid of anything that's at the perfect football kick height.
Am I supposed to be offended by this plush calling me gay and implying I have a dick despite clearly being a cute girl? 'Cause it just looks like a sad attempt at trolling to me.
... Is this plush gonna try to get us to kill each other or something? Does it realize we're not even trapped here?
Hey, I've heard of you. You're that guy, uh... Super, uh... Ultimate... Hang on, it'll come to me...
Wait wait, I know you, you're... not Ultimate Ronin... not Flamebringer Extreme... uh... can't be Rocketpunch Tanaka... Justice Blade Plus Ultra...?

Lemme see if I can guess your backstory: You never knew your parents. You lost your childhood friend, and now refuse to ever lose a friend again, while also setting out to be the best whatever you said you'd be. Am I right? I bet I am!
I hope you have some actual powers, 'cause it just isn't fun beatin' up fools who think courage, determination, and a sword are all they need to dish out justice anymore...
You know that Yu-Gi-Oh is just a rip-off of Magic: The Gathering, right? If you want me to take you seriously, play that instead.
Finally, a card-based something-or-other that doesn't just use Tarot or French-print cards...
Yu-Gi-Oh was much cooler back when it was about various games and not just the Magic rip-off...
Cards? Pass. Anyone still play Dungeon Dice Monsters, though?

I know I'm supposed to have something real mean to say to this guy, and mean things are my thing, but... I really don't care. So he killed a dog and a daughter for status, big whoop. Not like he committed genocide or something!
I'm sure you want me to say something extra mean to this guy, but... it's not even worth it. Not like I have the moral high-ground here, anyway.
So this guy killed his dog and his daughter. Big whoop. Do you know how many people I know who've done far worse things for fun?
So this guy killed his dog and his daughter. Why should I care? What do I look like? Batman?
So this guy killed his dog and his daughter. Am I supposed to care? Do I even need to tell you how that could've been worse?
You expect me to hate this guy? Do I even need to explain how I'm worse than him?
Oh, you think this guy's the worst? Don't study history, then. You'll quickly find out just how much more awful a human can be!
Suction cups? How primitive! Get with the times, loser! Grapple arms are where it's at!
Suction Cup Man? Geez, and I thought Kite Man was the pinnacle of lame...
Oh good, I was getting tired of simply cheating death. Now I can beat him outright!
"Bobobo" is a stupid name. It feels stupid coming out of my mouth. I'm just gonna call you "Bo."
Great going, ~player~. You broke something. You shouldn't be seeing this!
Oh... I think something broke. You shouldn't be seeing this.
Nice arm. Bet it doesn't compare to mine, though!
... Alright, fair enough, we could use more land. Tides are rising...
Not like I have much of a choice.
Tall, blonde, wearing blue... You that "Blue Paladin" I keep hearing about?
You must be Blue Paladin. I was expecting your armor to be more... modern.
You must be Ace, the Wonder Clown. Nice try, but I don't have coulrophobia!
Y'know, believe it or not, I've never met an evil clown -- and keep good tabs on fellow villains! Unless you're evil?
Ugh, those arms better be your only power. I am not dealing with another singing-power hero today...
Are those arms your only power? If so, you just met your superior!
Hey, did you dye your hair pink 'cause of me? Are you like my biggest fan or something?
Hey shortie, you oughta let your hair down like mine. The messy look is much better than... whatever you call that.
Hey, do yourself a favor and let your hair down, those pins make your bangs look like big nostrils.
Hmm, making jokes about how much you look like a child would be too easy... Says more about the people who're into you than it does you yourself, anyway...
Oh look, it's the me from the universe where I didn't build myself super rad robot arms.
Huh. You look kinda like I did before my design was adjusted...
You that "Magey Maggie" I keep hearing about? Can you teach me some magic or is it just "in your blood?"
You probably get this a lot, but what's up with your hair? Did you go to one of those avant-garde hair stylists? You should ask for your money back.
Your hair is weird. It's like, messy, but still orderly. Do you wake up every morning and comb it into that specific pattern?
I know a being of chaos when I see one! You and I are gonna get along just fine, Fourarms!
Ahahaha! A ladybug? That's the best you got? Do you even have any powers, or are you just some chick in a silly suit?
I know there are a lot of bug-themed heroes, but are there seriously so many of you that a ladybug was the best you could do?
Pffft, sure, a ladybug hero. What next, Phasmid Man?
Ugh, I hate spiders... You'd better not have a spider-face under that hood!
Ugh, I hate spiders... If you have any resemblance to a spider, I'm out!
Ooh-ravity? Yoo-ravity? Uh-ravity? Ur-avity? How the heck do you say it? Whatever. Clearly, you need a name-change.
Judging by your name, I take it you've got gravity powers? What, do you make people heavier or something? Not gonna work with me, you can't make flames heavier!
"Starfire," huh? Well, at least one of those things is a thing I enjoy. Guess which!
Wait, did you say your name is "Coriander?" As in, Chinese parsley? What, are you gonna spice me into submission or something?
I know that walk. You don't have legs. I can get ya some robotic ones, but only on one condition: You use them for evil.

You got fake legs, huh? I can tell. My sister lost her legs too. Surprised you're not using better legs. Crappy ones like whatever you got weren't good enough for Griz, they shouldn't be for you either!
I can tell by the way you walk, you're walking on fakes. You should get better ones. There's all kinds of cool crap you can cram in that space.
Nice fake legs. Not. You oughta get robotic ones -- or better yet, get robotic arms, they're crazy rad.
Are you the statue that got John Linnell high, or we just playing with some statue for no reason?
Ha! Patrolling the beach, kicking down sandcastles. Classic villainy!
Hey, just so you know, once you get your sandcastle done, I'ma kick it down. It's more fun to kick it down when you build it with the express purpose of being kick-proof!
Am I about to be the beach bully who kicks down sandcastles? Yes. Yes I am.
Let it be known that I am not above simple beach bullying. I'll kick down a sandcastle at the drop of a hat.
Muffins...? So you got muffin powers? What, do you turn people into muffins or something?
Oh man, a genie? Sweet! Three wishes!... But honestly, I dunno what I'd wish for. My life's great!
Oh man! Genies are the best! Nothing better than making someone regret getting exactly what they wished for!
Ah! Finally, a doctor who gets me! Cybernetics are just the best!
Well, if it isn't the coolest doctor I've ever seen! I know who I'm callin' next time I need some shots!
Please tell me you use that arm to forcefully immunize anti-vaccine idiots! That's my freakin' dream!
You're the one everyone hates, huh? Guess that makes you my best friend!
I hear everyone hates you. You know what that earns you? My eternal and unwavering support!
Hey, aren't you one of the chicks from that Mioda girl's former band, or am I thinking of some other all-girl band that has band practice at tea time?
A character made with the lowest amount of effort possible? Why? Everybody knows it's funny to pour mass amounts of energy into the dumbest thing you can think of!
A literal goddess, huh? Guess it's time to become a JRPG protagonist, 'cause I'm totally gonna kick this goddess's butt!
You're a lawyer, huh? Defense or prosecution? Because with me on trial, your job is either going to be a total breeze or the biggest battle of your life.
Pffft! "Panty?" Seriously? That's the dumbest name I've ever heard! That's not even a good stripper name!
Geez, and I thought "Nero Forte" was a dumb name! Congratulations, "Panty," yours takes the cake!
An elf, huh? What kinds of powers do elves have? More than just good hearing, I hope!
Taking a break from making toys, eh? That's a Christmas joke, if you didn't catch it.
Fat jokes are too easy. I gotta think up some elf disses... which... are gonna be much harder, apparently, but much more worthwhile as a result!
Wait a minute, don't tell me you are the "Ultimate Ronin" I heard about? I was told that was a guy, and that he dresses like a cowboy... shame on me for believing that part, I guess...
AI...? Huh... Now that I think about it, I've never met a rogue AI. I know evil robots, but not evil AI. Isn't that weird?
Do you... Do you just walk around in a swimsuit everywhere you go? I mean, you clearly love swimming, but do you have to make it so obvious?
You... do know you can wear swimsuits under anything, right? You don't have to walk around everywhere like that.
Do you like making it obvious that you're a swimmer, or do you just like showing off your legs?
You think you're hot stuff just 'cause you're good with guns? How much good do you think they'll do against someone like me?
Hey, did I hear you say something about you having father issues? Gee, sure does make me happy to have a loving, supportive father who has never wronged me! Ahaha hahaha!
Pretty smart of you going rocker instead of hero. If ice is all you got, you're not going far!
So you don't talk? At all? Great. It's like dealing with a mime, except somehow sadder...
So you broke out of prison, huh? Am I supposed to be impressed? I've done that too.
With powers like yours, why bother being on the side of good? You could do whatever you want!
Oh great, here comes the exposition...
So I'm supposed to be impressed with you just 'cause you have silky hair and big boobs? Like there aren't literally billions of other women like that alive right now?
No joke, I respect what you do. Cutting through all the bullcrap and "games" that come with dating. And if a few hundred fools fall in a spike pit in the process, that's not your problem.

Make no mistake, though, no matter what order you take things off in, I'm still going to mock and jeer you!
Make no mistake, though, no matter what order you take things off in, I'm still going to mock and jeer you!

I wonder if there's any way I can make the other opponents less appealing for you to look at... Probably not without a level of psychological warfare inappropriate for a non-enemy...
Ugh, could you possibly be any louder? We get it, you're getting off.
You are putting on your best performance, right? 'Cause I'm not feeling a thing over here! Try harder!
If you can't manage to finish, you can just go home. I'm sure no one will be disappointed. No one at all.

You wouldn't date a girl with metal hands, would you? I mean, you wouldn't like the idea of metal hands touching down there, right? Even I don't like that idea, and I have to live with them...
Now that I think about it, I'm not sure how to go about making these hands softer... At least not to the point where they'd be, uh... pleasant down there...

I may be a genius in regards to a lot of things, but this sort of thing is... something I've not really researched...
If you're thinking about my tether at all... Don't. Just don't.

Enjoy festering in your own fluids, chump!
You're cleaning that up yourself. If you don't, I will make you clean it up.

And now you're as irrelevant to this match as you could possibly be! How does that make you feel?
Gross.

I actually kinda like losing like this. The arousal is a bit overwhelming, but it feels good... unlike these hands...

I wouldn't have admitted it before, but Nero scared me. I would've ended up just like Crosshair if I couldn't manage to catch him by surprise -- would've smashed my arms and beat me to death with his bare fists.
The grapple feature is pretty useful... and I should probably keep a weapon or two just in case... Eh, maybe it'd be easier just to tweak these than it'd be to start from scratch...
Do you think my evil side will return? If it does, maybe I can learn to control it -- y'know, like the Hulk.

Lemme just prove my earlier point: When's the last time you heard about some crime going down? Pretty recently, I bet. When's the last time you heard about someone holding the door for a stranger? Or helping someone reach an item on the top shelf? The "Penny Challenge?" Exactly.
Hey, um... For what it's worth, I'm sorry about... literally everything I've said here...

I still can't believe I got myself off with these...
I really meant it when I said I'm a people person, by the way. But now I don't have a love for messing with people in the way of that.

So, um... Yeah, I've been evil since birth, and I committed myself so hard to villainy that I never gave myself time for boyfriends... or girlfriends, for that matter. I'm not even sure if I'm into girls... or boys either... I'll have to do some soul-searching later...

So... Any theories as to why I suddenly un-eviled? Currently, my best guess is that losing at a game I was cheating at caused my evil to hit critical mass and basically go supernova.
Honestly? I'm as surprised as I am disappointed my skin and hair were both that way 'cause of the evil. It was a pretty good look.
Y'know, I could probably give pretty decent electrode massages with these hands... Once I work in an intensity-setting function...

Here's a positive thought: Most of our fears are unfounded. When we see bad things happening on the news, we only accept them as "the way things are" to validate our fears, when in reality, everything we hear about is only a fraction of what's actually happening in the world.

Y'know, I think John Linnell got it right when he sang "No one in the world ever gets what they want and that is beautiful." There's some ironic comfort that comes from the idea that it's impossible to live a completely content life.

Honestly, if Batman were real, I don't think I could've beaten him when I was evil -- yeah, that's right. I wasn't scared of the most OP super hero ever but I'm scared of the guy known for having no powers. No powers means no Kryptonite!
Honestly, if Batman were real, I don't think I could've beaten him when I was evil. Every villain thinks they can outsmart him and never do. I don't think I'm special.
Do you think any super heroes I encounter from here on will believe I'm no longer evil?... They probably won't -- especially the Order of Heroes. They're, uh... not exactly keen on redemption.
Better luck next time, losers!
Let that be a lesson. No matter how many opponents I face at once, I'll still come out on top!
Like I already said, you've gotta try a lot harder than that to beat me. Why don't we try this again when you can gather up seven more people to try to beat me with! Ha!
